reviews.text: Plenty of ticket machines at the top of the station but very much lacking in accessibility. There's easy to read information boards and a small coffee shop, but there's a real lack of seating on the platforms, or any coverage from the elements further down the platforms.

The station has no lifts and is only partially staffed throughout the day making it poor in terms of accessibility. Trains towards London off peak leave almost perfectly clock faced making it very easy indeed to remember when trains serve here.

reviews.author_name: London Flareon Tokyo Ebisu - Swanslade 恵比寿-スワンズレイド
reviews.text: Saint Margarets is located in the St. Margarets section of Twickenham, the station is served by Southwest Trains, Saint Margarets is a fair station and a pretty nice one too, the neighbourhood is quiet and clean and train service is great.
Agreed with previous poster.. The staff at the station is useless.. Totally gave me wrong directions.. He had 1 job.. 1 only and can't get it right!!!!!!
